Button.tooltip: Deletes EVERYTHING on YOUR side of table

VerticalLayout.Text: Click ? on that line to deep search
Also, copy paste that line and post in discord or steam workshop to notify SpaceNavy!

Button.tooltip: Deletes EVERYTHING on YOUR side of table

VerticalLayout.Text: You can report the results of your games!
This data will be utilized for list building assistance, ELO calculation, and competitive card discussions!

HorizontalLayout.Text: Place Objective in Designated Spot on Left side of board!
Ranked Games will impact Competitive Ranking
Click the page numbers below to explore recent features
Join the Star Wars: Regiment discord : https://discord.gg/wfaAHsuSjd
Start with one of the Tutorial Datacards on the left OR
on the right sidebar to spawn a list

VerticalLayout.Text: On the left side of the table near the rules, you will find 4 datacards.
These represent the 4 faction's starter armies in the "Learn to Play" section of the Star Wars: Regiment rulebook.
Clicking: "Spawn Army" will create the army in front of you.
When lists are spawned from the Army Spawner, they will generate a "Datacard".
These can be saved for later by right clicking ► Save Object, and restored later by Objects ► Saved Objects
If you would like to capture your manually assembled list, Place all cards from your list on your side of the board, grab an empty datacard from between the dice rollers, and click "Store Army".
"Spawner" found on far right side of screen.
Lists can be pasted from the official SWREG Army Builder.
Lines in red will not spawn.
If that is a mistake, Click "?" to attempt to resolve it.
To spawn individual units/ugprades/objectives, access the "Units" and "Upgrades" tabs
